description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a). 21 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Dark cream paper with pulp and a few lines visible. Marginal annotations throughout. Collation: Paper, fol. 10 ; 1¹⁰ ; catchword on the verso of the first and second leaf. Copied by Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jawharī on 6 Rajab 840 (colophon, fol. 10b). Incipit: جزؤ يذكر فيه ان بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم اية من الفاتحة قال الشافعى رضى الله عنه انها اية من اول الفاتحة ويجب قراتها مع الفاتحة Explicit: الفرع التاسع اجمع العلما على انه يستجب ... من اجل قوله بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم والحمد لله وحده وصلوته على سيدنا محمد واله وصحبه وسلم تسليما كثيرا وحسبنا الله ونعم الوكيل
author: Rāzī, Fakhr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar, 1149 or 1150-1210
abstract: Short excerpt from Fakhr al-Dīn al-Rāzī's commentary of the Qurʼān, corresponding to ed. Būlāq, 1278 H., p. 106, l. 3 - 114, l. 6 (Mach, R. Yahuda).
extent: 10 leaves: paper ; 182 x 130 (130 x 95) mm. bound to 188 x 140 mm.
title: Juzʼ fīhi al-dalīl ʻalá anna al-basmalah min al-Fātiḥah wa-ʻalá al-jahr bi-hā
provenance: Ownership statements on fol. 1a, one signed Muḥammad JGHNī al-Marīdī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī al-Azharī, who bought this copy from Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ al----(?), on Rajab 1, 1325 H. [Aug. 10, 1907]. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: رازي، فخر الدين محمد بن عمر
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Fātiḥah—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Modern library binding in red cloth. Paper pastedowns and free endpaper.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
